name: Sark Douls
description:
You are a dungeon boss man who wishes to retire, but you cannot do so without a fight! Unfortunately all these dungeon raiders are so puny and weak! Try not to crush them in this game of pacifism!

IT RELATES TO THE THEME IN THAT THE GIFT IS YOUR DEFEAT AND IT CAN NOT BE GIVEN!!!

How to Play

  • Arrow Keys to attack (and move)
  • Try not to hit people!
  • Try to die (Hint: You can't!)
